meanings.sent1: The document was typeable, so I quickly typed it up.
meanings.sent2: The typeable keyboard made it easy to input the information.
meanings.sent3: I never thought a piece of paper could be typeable, but here we are!
meanings.sent4: Her words were so clear and typeable, they seemed to jump off the page.
meanings.sent5: The typeable nature of the form made it a breeze to fill out.

meanings.sent1: The typeable font was easy to read on the screen.
meanings.sent2: This paper is typeable, so you can use the typewriter on it.
meanings.sent3: I found a typeable pen that works perfectly on touchscreens!
meanings.sent4: The typeable layout of the document made it user-friendly.
meanings.sent5: The typeable keys on the keyboard were a joy to use.
